tbPageSizeSelector component in tubular.directives

The tbPageSizeSelector component is visual helper to render a dropdown to allow user select how many rows by page.

Component's attributes

Param Type Details
caption string

Set the caption to use in the button, default "Page size:".
css string

Add a CSS class to the div HTML element.
selectorCss string

Add a CSS class to the select HTML element.
options array

Set the page options array, default [10, 20, 50, 100].
